title: Twilight Zone - The Movie
description:
Four directors collaborated to remake four episodes of the popular television series 'The 

Twilight Zone' for this movie. The episodes are updated slightly and in color (the 

television show was in black-and-white), but very true to the originals, where eerie and 

disturbing situations gradually spin out of control.
